description.zh-cn: 1929年中华民国与苏联因中东铁路权益问题爆发的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict in 1929 between the Republic of China and the Soviet Union over the control of the Chinese Eastern Railway.

description.zh-cn: 1912年至1949年间统治中国大陆的政权，中东路事件中的一方。
description.en: The government that ruled mainland China from 1912 to 1949, a combatant in the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟，中东路事件中的一方。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, a combatant in the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 俄国内战中反对布尔什维克政府的松散政治军事力量，其残余部队在中东路事件中协助中华民国作战。
description.en: A loose confederation of anti-communist forces that fought the Bolsheviks in the Russian Civil War. Remnant forces assisted the Republic of China in the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，在中东路事件中支持苏联。
description.en: The ruling party of China, which supported the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，奉系军阀首领，主政中国东北并下令武力收回中东铁路，引发中东路事件。
description.en: A Marshal of the Republic of China, leader of the Fengtian clique, who controlled Northeast China and ordered the forceful takeover of the Chinese Eastern Railway, triggering the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国国民政府主席，支持张学良对苏联采取强硬立场。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, who supported Zhang Xueliang's hardline stance against the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，在中东路事件期间下令成立红旗远东特别集团军进行反击。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union, who ordered the formation of the Special Red Banner Far Eastern Army to counterattack during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

nodes.id: 瓦西里·康斯坦丁诺维奇·布柳赫尔

zh-cn: 瓦西里·康斯坦丁诺维奇·布柳赫尔

description.zh-cn: 苏联元帅，时任红旗远东特别集团军司令，指挥苏军在中东路事件中作战。
description.en: Marshal of the Soviet Union, commander of the Special Red Banner Far Eastern Army, who led Soviet forces in the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 横贯中国东北的铁路，其权益归属是中东路事件的直接导火索。
description.en: A railway running through Northeast China, the dispute over its control was the direct cause of the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 由张学良领导的地方军队，是中东路事件中与苏军作战的主力。
description.en: The regional army led by Zhang Xueliang, which was the main force fighting the Soviet army in the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

en: Special Red Banner Far Eastern Army

description.zh-cn: 苏联为应对中东路事件而专门成立的集团军，由瓦西里·布柳赫尔指挥。
description.en: An army group specially formed by the Soviet Union to deal with the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929, commanded by Vasily Blyukher.

description.zh-cn: 东北军高级将领，因与张学良不和而被其处决。
description.en: A senior general of the Northeastern Army, executed by Zhang Xueliang due to disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 东北军高级官员，与杨宇霆一同被张学良处决。
description.en: A senior official of the Northeastern Army, executed along with Yang Yuting by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 东北军第17旅旅长，在扎赉诺尔战役中阵亡。
description.en: Commander of the 17th Brigade of the Northeastern Army, killed in action during the Battle of Zhalainuoer.

description.zh-cn: 东北军第15旅旅长，在满洲里战斗中被苏军包围后投降。
description.en: Commander of the 15th Brigade of the Northeastern Army, who surrendered after being surrounded by Soviet forces in the Battle of Manzhouli.

description.zh-cn: 1929年12月20日由中苏代表签订的议定书，结束了中东路事件，恢复了苏联在中东路的权益。
description.en: A protocol signed by Chinese and Soviet representatives on December 20, 1929, which ended the Sino-Soviet conflict and restored Soviet rights on the Chinese Eastern Railway.

description.zh-cn: 位于黑龙江和乌苏里江交汇处的岛屿，在中东路事件后被苏联完全占领。
description.en: An island at the confluence of the Heilongjiang and Ussuri rivers, which was fully occupied by the Soviet Union after the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 1931年日本关东军在中国东北发动的侵略事件，中东路事件中东北军的溃败在一定程度上促成了此事件的发生。
description.en: An invasion incident launched by the Japanese Kwantung Army in Northeast China in 1931. The defeat of the Northeastern Army in the Sino-Soviet conflict partly contributed to its occurrence.

description.zh-cn: 日本帝国陆军的一支重要部队，驻扎在中国东北，发动了九一八事变。
description.en: An important unit of the Imperial Japanese Army stationed in Northeast China, which launched the Mukden Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人，因反对中共在中东路事件中“武装保卫苏联”的口号而被开除党籍。
description.en: An early principal leader of the Chinese Communist Party, who was expelled for opposing the CCP's slogan of 'Arming to defend the Soviet Union' during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 中东路事件期间，中国共产党提出的支持苏联的政治运动和口号。
description.en: A political movement and slogan proposed by the Chinese Communist Party to support the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict of 1929.

description.zh-cn: 张学良下令以武力强行收回中东铁路，直接引发了中东路事件。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang ordered the forceful takeover of the Chinese Eastern Railway, directly triggering the Sino-Soviet conflict.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正支持张学良对苏联采取强硬立场，并承诺中央政府将提供军事和财政援助。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek supported Zhang Xueliang's hardline stance against the Soviet Union and promised military and financial aid from the central government.

description.zh-cn: 因中东铁路权益问题爆发武装冲突，并一度断绝外交关系。
description.en: Engaged in an armed conflict over the rights of the Chinese Eastern Railway and temporarily severed diplomatic relations.

description.zh-cn: 作为中华民国的盟友，俄国白军参与了对抗苏联的战斗。
description.en: As an ally of the Republic of China, the White Russian Army participated in the fighting against the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中东路事件中支持苏联，并提出“武装保卫苏联”的口号。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party supported the Soviet Union during the Sino-Soviet conflict and put forward the slogan 'Arming to defend the Soviet Union'.

description.zh-cn: 东北军是由张学良统帅的地方军队。
description.en: The Northeastern Army was the regional military force commanded by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 张学良在1929年初处决了东北军重臣杨宇霆，以巩固自己的权力。
description.en: In early 1929, Zhang Xueliang executed Yang Yuting, a senior official in the Northeastern Army, to consolidate his power.

description.zh-cn: 张学良在1929年初处决了东北军重臣常荫槐，以巩固自己的权力。
description.en: In early 1929, Zhang Xueliang executed Chang Yinhuai, a senior official in the Northeastern Army, to consolidate his power.

description.zh-cn: 东北军在与苏联红旗远东特别集团军的战斗中遭遇惨败，损失惨重。
description.en: The Northeastern Army suffered a crushing defeat with heavy casualties in battles against the Soviet Special Red Banner Far Eastern Army.

description.zh-cn: 东北军旅长韩光第在扎赉诺尔战役中阵亡。
description.en: Northeastern Army brigade commander Han Guangdi was killed in action during the Battle of Zhalainuoer.

description.zh-cn: 东北军旅长梁忠甲在满洲里战斗中兵败被俘。
description.en: Northeastern Army brigade commander Liang Zhongjia was defeated and captured during the Battle of Manzhouli.

description.zh-cn: 该议定书的签订恢复了苏联在中东铁路的全部权益。
description.en: The signing of this protocol restored all of the Soviet Union's rights and interests on the Chinese Eastern Railway.

description.zh-cn: 南京国民政府不承认由地方代表蔡运升签署的《伯力议定书》，认为其超越权限。
description.en: The Nanjing Nationalist Government refused to recognize the Khabarovsk Protocol signed by local representative Cai Yunsheng, deeming it to have exceeded his authority.

description.zh-cn: 中东路事件后，苏联军队继续占领了整个黑瞎子岛。
description.en: After the Sino-Soviet conflict, Soviet troops continued to occupy the entire Bolshoy Ussuriysky Island (Heixiazi Island).

description.zh-cn: 东北军在中东路事件中的迅速溃败，暴露了其军事上的虚弱，坚定了日本关东军发动侵略的决心。
description.en: The rapid collapse of the Northeastern Army in the Sino-Soviet conflict exposed its military weakness, strengthening the Japanese Kwantung Army's resolve to launch an invasion.

description.zh-cn: 中东路事件爆发后，中国共产党发起了“武装保卫苏联”的运动以支持苏联。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Sino-Soviet conflict, the Chinese Communist Party launched the 'Arming to defend the Soviet Union' movement to support the USSR.

description.zh-cn: 因陈独秀反对“武装保卫苏联”的口号，中国共产党将其开除党籍。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party expelled Chen Duxiu for his opposition to the 'Arming to defend the Soviet Union' slogan.
